name: Fiction
description: Narrative prose covering a wide range of realistic and imaginative stories.

name: Dystopian
description: Fiction set in oppressive, often futuristic societies highlighting social and political critique.

name: Romance
description: Stories focused on romantic relationships and emotional development.

name: Fantasy
description: Works featuring magical elements, invented worlds, and mythical creatures.

name: Epic
description: Long-form narratives centered on heroic journeys and grand scale adventures.

name: Adventure
description: Action-driven tales emphasizing exploration, danger, and thrills.

name: Psychological Thriller
description: Intense stories focused on characters' mental and emotional states and suspense.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Fictional narratives set against accurately depicted historical backdrops.

name: Gothic
description: Atmospheric tales featuring mystery, decay, and dark romanticism.

name: Gothic Horror
description: Gothic elements combined with supernatural horror and dread.

name: Science Fiction
description: Speculative works exploring technology, science, and future societies.

name: Satire
description: Work that uses humor, irony, or exaggeration to critique society or individuals.

name: Comedy
description: Lighthearted stories prioritizing humor and entertaining situations.

name: Mystery
description: Plots centered on solving crimes, secrets, or unexplained events.

name: Tragedy
description: Stories that explore human suffering, loss, and moral complexity.
